name: Authority
body:
# Authority
Object-oriented Rails authorization. It's flipping awesome.

## Real Quotes

"This is the best Rails authorization library I've ever written. This is the only Rails authorization library I've ever written." - Nathan Long

## Fake Quotes

"Authority is great! Hahahaha. Is that what you wanted me to say?" - Aaron 'Tenderlove' Patterson

"Authority? What's that?" - Yukihiro 'Matz' Matsumoto

"Authority is amazing. It makes me wish that I had invented Rails instead of my nemesis, 'Macho Man' Randy Savage." - BizarroWorld David Heinemeier Hansson
tagline: Authority helps you authorize actions in your Rails app. It's ORM-neutral and has very little fancy syntax; just group your models under one or more Authorizer classes and write plain Ruby methods on them.
